hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Brënda Librave ("we", "us", "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your information when you visit our website and use our services.
introduction.paragraph2: By using our services, you agree to the practices described in this policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use our services.

content.subtitle: Personal Information
content.text: We collect information such as name, email address, phone number, and shipping address when you create an account or place an order.

content.subtitle: Payment Information
content.text: Credit card data and billing information are securely stored through our certified payment partners.

content.subtitle: Usage Information
content.text: We collect information about how you use our website, including pages visited, time spent, and preferences.

content.subtitle: Order Fulfillment
content.text: We use your information to fulfill orders, contact you about your order, and ensure delivery.

content.subtitle: Service Improvement
content.text: We analyze data to improve your experience, personalize recommendations, and optimize our website.

content.subtitle: Communication
content.text: We will send you emails about your orders, product updates, and special offers (if you are subscribed).

content.subtitle: Shipping Partners
content.text: We share shipping information with shipping companies to enable delivery of your orders.

content.subtitle: Service Providers
content.text: We work with trusted providers for payments, analytics, and technical support, all bound by confidentiality agreements.

content.subtitle: Legal Requests
content.text: We may share information if required by law or to protect our rights and user safety.

content.subtitle: Encryption
content.text: All data is transmitted through SSL/TLS encryption and stored on secure servers.

content.subtitle: Limited Access
content.text: Only authorized personnel have access to personal data, and all sign confidentiality agreements.

content.subtitle: Monitoring
content.text: We continuously monitor our systems to identify and prevent any suspicious activity.

content.subtitle: Access and Correction
content.text: You have the right to view and correct personal information we have about you at any time.

content.subtitle: Data Deletion
content.text: You can request deletion of your personal data, except for those necessary for legal purposes.

content.subtitle: Portability
content.text: You can request a copy of your personal data in your preferred format.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our website. Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Required for basic website functionality, such as shopping cart storage.

analytics.description: Used to analyze traffic and improve user experience.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
hero.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our services

questions.question: How long does book shipping take?
questions.answer: Shipping to Tirana is done within 24 hours, while to other cities in Albania within 48-72 hours. For orders placed on Friday after 4:00 PM or weekends, shipping starts on Monday.

questions.question: Is there a cost for shipping?
questions.answer: Shipping is free for orders over 2,000 ALL. For orders below this amount, shipping cost is 300 ALL in Tirana and 500 ALL in other cities.

questions.question: How can I track my order?
questions.answer: After order confirmation, you will receive an email with the tracking code. You can use this code in the "Track Order" section or in your profile.

questions.question: Can I cancel my order after confirmation?
questions.answer: Yes, orders can be cancelled up to 2 hours after confirmation, if they haven't been prepared for shipping yet. After this time, you need to contact customer service.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept debit/credit card payments (Visa, Mastercard), PayPal, and cash on delivery (only in Tirana). We also accept bank transfers.

questions.question: Are the prices final?
questions.answer: Yes, all prices displayed on our website include VAT. There are no hidden costs, except for shipping cost if you don't qualify for free shipping.

questions.question: Do you offer discounts for multiple purchases?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer 5% discount for orders over 5,000 ALL, 10% for orders over 10,000 ALL, and 15% for orders over 20,000 ALL. Discounts are applied automatically.

questions.question: Do I need to create an account to place orders?
questions.answer: No, you can place orders as a visitor. However, creating an account allows you to track orders, save addresses, and receive personalized recommendations.

questions.question: How can I change my password?
questions.answer: Go to "Profile" > "Settings" > "Change Password". You will need to enter your current password and the new one. You will receive a confirmation email.

questions.question: How can I delete my account?
questions.answer: You can delete your account by contacting us at info@brendalibrave.al. Your data will be deleted within 30 days, in compliance with GDPR.

questions.question: Are all books original?
questions.answer: Yes, all books we sell are original and new. We work directly with authorized publishers and distributors to ensure quality.

questions.question: How can I recommend a book?
questions.answer: You can send us suggestions for new books in the "Contact" section or via email. You can also participate in our readers forum.

hero.subtitle: Read the terms and conditions for using our services

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
content: By using Brënda Librave services, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions.
If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our services.
We reserve the right to change these terms at any time without prior notice.

definitions.title: 2. Definitions
content: "Company", "we", "us", "our" refers to Brënda Librave.
"User", "you", "your" refers to the person using our services.
"Services" includes our website and all services offered.
"Products" includes all books and other items sold through our website.

usage.title: 3. Use of Services
content: You must be at least 18 years old or have parental consent to use the services.
You are responsible for all activities conducted under your account.
You may not use the services for illegal or harmful purposes.
We reserve the right to suspend or close your account for violation of terms.

orders.title: 4. Orders and Payment
content: All orders are subject to product availability.
Prices may change without prior notice.
Payments must be made at the time of order or as agreed terms.
We reserve the right to cancel orders for various reasons.

shipping.title: 5. Shipping and Delivery
content: Shipping times are estimates and may vary.
Risk of loss passes to you after the product is delivered.
You are responsible for ensuring the correct shipping address.
Shipping costs are in accordance with our pricing policy.

returns.title: 6. Returns and Refunds
content: Products can be returned within 14 days from delivery date.
Products must be in original condition to be returned.
Return shipping cost is covered by the customer, except in cases of our errors.
Refunds are made within 7-14 business days after receiving the return.

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
content: All content on our website is protected by intellectual property laws.
You may not copy, distribute or use our content without permission.
Trademarks and logos are property of their respective owners.
You grant us the right to use content you post on our website.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
content: Our services are provided "as is" without specific warranties.
We are not responsible for indirect or consequential damages.
Our liability is limited to the value of the order you made.
Some jurisdictions do not allow liability limitations, so these limitations may not apply to you.

book.title: The Albanian Language in Contemporary Literature
book.subtitle: A deep study on the evolution of language
book.description: This book explores the development of the Albanian language in 21st century literature, analyzing the impact of technology and globalization on literary expression. The author presents a fresh perspective on preserving cultural identity through written language.
book.quote: "Language is the greatest wealth of a nation, and literature is the temple where this wealth is preserved and renewed." - Naim Frashëri

article.title: The History of the Albanian Language
article.subtitle: A journey through time and culture
article.content: The Albanian language is one of the oldest languages in Europe, with roots stretching thousands of years back. It has maintained its unique characteristics throughout the centuries, despite multiple external influences.
article.blockquote: "Our language makes us who we are, and who we are makes us have our language."
